filmography.title: The Gold of Naples
filmography.role_description: A vivacious pizza seller who loses her engagement ring and must frantically search for it while hiding the loss from her jealous husband.
filmography.plot: An anthology film depicting life in Naples, where a beautiful pizzaiola loses her ring in a batch of dough.

filmography.title: Too Bad She's Bad
filmography.role_description: A stunning young thief who tries to swindle a naive taxi driver, only to find herself falling in love with him.
filmography.plot: A cab driver gets involved with a beautiful girl and her family of thieves who try to steal his taxi.

filmography.title: Boy on a Dolphin
filmography.role_description: A Greek sponge diver who discovers an ancient golden statue underwater and becomes torn between two men who want it.
filmography.plot: A woman finds a treasure off the coast of the Greek islands and draws the attention of an archaeologist and an unscrupulous collector.

filmography.title: The Pride and the Passion
filmography.role_description: A Spanish guerrilla fighter who becomes the object of affection for both a British naval officer and a local resistance leader.
filmography.plot: During the Napoleonic Wars, a British captain tries to retrieve a massive cannon from Spanish guerrillas to help defeat the French.

filmography.title: Desire Under the Elms
filmography.role_description: A young Italian woman who marries an elderly farmer for his land but engages in a passionate affair with his son.
filmography.plot: A farmer's new young wife falls in love with his son, leading to a tragic conflict over land and legacy.

filmography.title: The Key
filmography.role_description: A mysterious woman living in a flat passed down between tugboat captains during WWII, coping with the loss of each lover.
filmography.plot: During World War II, a series of tugboat captains share an apartment and the love of a grieving woman who lives there.

filmography.title: The Black Orchid
filmography.role_description: A grieving widow of a gangster who tries to find happiness with a widower, despite the objections of their children.
filmography.plot: A widower and a widow plan to marry, but their children's disapproval threatens their happiness.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Win – Best Actress (Volpi Cup)

filmography.title: Houseboat
filmography.role_description: A runaway Italian socialite who takes a job as a housekeeper for a widower and his three children aboard a houseboat.
filmography.plot: A widower hires a housekeeper to help him raise his three children, unaware that she is a socialite running away from her father.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Heller in Pink Tights
filmography.role_description: A flamboyant theatrical troupe actress who bets herself in a poker game, causing trouble for her company in the Wild West.
filmography.plot: A traveling theatre troupe in the Old West faces financial ruin, Indians, and a jealous gunfighter.

filmography.title: It Started in Naples
filmography.role_description: A fiery nightclub singer and aunt fighting for custody of her nephew against a visiting American lawyer.
filmography.plot: An American lawyer travels to Naples to settle his late brother's estate and becomes involved in a custody battle with the boy's aunt.

filmography.title: Two Women
filmography.role_description: A widow who flees wartime Rome with her teenage daughter, only to face a brutal tragedy that tests their bond and survival.
filmography.plot: In World War II Italy, a widow and her daughter flee Rome for the countryside, but a terrible encounter changes their lives forever.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; Cannes: Win – Best Actress; BAFTA: Win – Best Foreign Actress

filmography.title: The Millionairess
filmography.role_description: The richest woman in the world who falls in love with a humble Indian doctor and tries to win his heart with her wealth.
filmography.plot: A spoiled heiress falls for a dedicated doctor who is indifferent to her money, leading to a series of comedic tests.

filmography.title: El Cid
filmography.role_description: The noble wife of the legendary Spanish hero El Cid, whose love endures despite political exile and war.
filmography.plot: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz (El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

filmography.title: Boccaccio '70
filmography.role_description: A lottery prize winner in a carnival who offers herself as the prize but falls for a humble sacristan instead.
filmography.plot: An anthology film featuring four stories about modern morality and love; Loren stars in the segment 'The Raffle'.

filmography.title: The Condemned of Altona
filmography.role_description: An actress who marries into a wealthy German shipbuilding family and uncovers their dark Nazi past.
filmography.plot: A family of German industrialists must confront their Nazi past when it is revealed that one of the sons is living in the attic.
filmography.awards: David di Donatello: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
filmography.role_description: Three different roles: a cigarette seller evading prison, a wealthy socialite, and a call girl with a famous striptease.
filmography.plot: Three short stories about couples in different parts of Italy, featuring a woman who stays pregnant to avoid jail and a famous striptease.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Foreign Language Film (Italy); David di Donatello: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: The Fall of the Roman Empire
filmography.role_description: The daughter of Emperor Marcus Aurelius who is torn between her duty to her family and her love for a general.
filmography.plot: The death of Marcus Aurelius leads to a succession crisis between his corrupt son Commodus and his loyal general Livius.

filmography.title: Marriage Italian Style
filmography.role_description: A former prostitute who tricks her long-time lover into marriage by pretending to be on her deathbed.
filmography.plot: A woman who has been a businessman's mistress for years tricks him into marrying her, sparking a battle of wits.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Comedy/Musical)

filmography.title: Lady L
filmography.role_description: An elderly aristocrat who recounts her colorful past as a laundress in a Parisian brothel and her loves with an anarchist and a Lord.
filmography.plot: An 80-year-old woman recalls her life, loves, and rise from poverty to aristocracy to her biographer.

filmography.title: Arabesque
filmography.role_description: A mysterious and glamorous spy who entangles an American professor in a dangerous plot involving hieroglyphics.
filmography.plot: A university professor is recruited to decipher a secret message and gets involved in an assassination plot with a beautiful spy.

filmography.title: Sunflower
filmography.role_description: A desperate Italian woman who travels to the Soviet Union to find her husband who went missing during WWII.
filmography.plot: After WWII, an Italian woman goes to Russia to find her husband, who was reported missing in action.
filmography.awards: David di Donatello: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: Man of La Mancha
filmography.role_description: A tavern serving wench whom the delusional Don Quixote envisions as his pure and noble lady, Dulcinea.
filmography.plot: The film version of the musical play about Don Quixote, the mad knight who fights windmills and sees beauty in a serving wench.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: A Special Day
filmography.role_description: A weary, overworked housewife who forms an unexpected and deep connection with her persecuted gay neighbor on the day of Hitler's visit to Rome.
filmography.plot: On the day Hitler visits Mussolini in Rome, a housewife and her neighbor forge a brief but intense friendship.
filmography.awards: David di Donatello: Win – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Foreign Film

filmography.title: Prêt-à-Porter
filmography.role_description: The stylish, mysterious wife of a fashion council head whose death sparks a scandal during Paris Fashion Week.
filmography.plot: A murder investigation during Paris Fashion Week reveals the interconnections and absurdities of the fashion industry.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Grumpier Old Men
filmography.role_description: A vibrant Italian woman who opens a restaurant in a small Minnesota town, capturing the heart of a grumpy local.
filmography.plot: John and Max are back, still fighting, but this time their rivalry is complicated by the arrival of a beautiful Italian restaurant owner.

filmography.title: Nine
filmography.role_description: The deceased mother of the protagonist filmmaker, appearing in his memories and fantasies to offer guidance.
filmography.plot: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal life as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, mistress, muse, agent, and mother.

filmography.title: The Life Ahead
filmography.role_description: An aging Holocaust survivor and former prostitute who forms a bond with a young Senegalese street kid who robbed her.
filmography.plot: An aging Holocaust survivor forges a bond with a young immigrant from Senegal who recently robbed her.
filmography.awards: David di Donatello: Win – Best Actress
